results.name: Symmetric square array defined by T(n,k)=(k^2*n^2 + kn + 1), read by antidiagonals.
xref: Rows include A054569, A002061, A082040, A082041. Main diagonal is A059826.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 02 2003
